statements: SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters;
SELECT claim_id, investigation_details FROM ClaimsAdjusters;
SELECT settlement_decision FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE claim_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE findings LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE settlement_decision='Approved';
SELECT claim_id, investigation_details FROM ClaimsAdjusters ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE investigation_details LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters ORDER BY settlement_decision ASC, claim_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, findings FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE settlement_decision='Pending' AND investigation_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM claims_adjusters;
SELECT id, name, location FROM claims_adjusters ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT specialization FROM claims_adjusters WHERE location='New York';
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, settlement FROM insurance_claims WHERE settlement > 1000 ORDER BY settlement DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_adjusters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, specialization FROM claims_adjusters ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE settlement > 1000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, location, specialization FROM claims_adjusters WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims_Adjusters ORDER BY settlement DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, adjuster_id, findings FROM Claims_Adjusters WHERE settlement > 5000;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_location FROM Adjusters ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT policy_number, claim_date, status FROM Insurance_Claims WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Claims_Adjusters JOIN Adjusters ON Claims_Adjusters.adjuster_id = Adjusters.adjuster_id;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_location FROM Adjusters
SELECT claim_id, investigation_info, findings FROM Claims_Adjusters
SELECT adjuster_id, years_of_experience FROM Adjusters WHERE adjuster_location = 'New York'
SELECT policy_number, claim_date, status FROM Insurance_Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_location, years_of_experience FROM Adjusters INNER JOIN Claims_Adjusters ON Adjusters.adjuster_id = Claims_Adjusters.adjuster_id
SELECT * FROM investigations;
SELECT claim_id, investigator_name, investigation_date FROM investigations WHERE investigation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, document_type, document_description FROM documents ORDER BY document_type DESC;
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, policyholder_name FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT settlement_id, claim_id, settlement_date, settlement_amount FROM settlements WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE investigation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT investigator_name, findings FROM investigations WHERE investigation_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT documents.document_type, documents.document_description, claims.claim_amount FROM documents JOIN claims ON documents.claim_id = claims.claim_id;
SELECT claims.policyholder_name, settlements.settlement_amount FROM claims JOIN settlements ON claims.claim_id = settlements.claim_id WHERE settlements.settlement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(settlement_amount) AS max_settlement_amount, AVG(settlement_amount) AS avg_settlement_amount FROM settlements WHERE settlement_reason LIKE '%damage%';
SELECT * FROM investigations;
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, investigation_date FROM investigations;
SELECT * FROM findings WHERE investigation_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM adjusters;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, investigation_date FROM investigations ORDER BY investigation_date DESC;
SELECT settlement_id, claim_id, settlement_amount, settlement_date FROM settlements WHERE settlement_amount > 10000;
SELECT claim_id, policyholder_name, claim_date, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT adjuster_id, adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM adjusters WHERE adjuster_phone LIKE '%123%';
